channel.title: Storefront on Steven Lemonier
channel.description: Recent content in Storefront on Steven Lemonier

item.title: Citrix Logon Simulator
item.description: Note: I recommend you to read the following post but if you’re only interested by the script: here it is. An introduction I always wanted to monitor correctly the end-user experience and especially application availability. Like, at any time of the day, can my business-critical resource be opened without any issue? And if there is, at which stage does it fails? Log on to the portal? Application enumeration? At the application launch?
